label: 関白
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: viceroy, chancellor. The most powerful figure at the mid-Heian court, and generally a member of the northern branch of the Fujiwara family. The kanpaku frequently spoke for the sovereign (tennō). See sesshō, Sekkanke.
